statements: DELETE FROM machinery_sensor_data WHERE machine_id = 100 AND sensor_type = 'Temperature';
DELETE FROM machinery_sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 101 AND machine_id = 201
DELETE FROM machinery_sensor_data WHERE machine_id = 202 AND sensor_type = 'Temperature'
DELETE FROM machinery_sensors WHERE sensor_name = 'Temperature Sensor';
DELETE FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE sensor_id = 101 AND schedule_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM machinery_sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature Sensor' AND location = 'Room A';
DELETE FROM machinery_data WHERE sensor_id = 101 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive' AND machinery_id IN (SELECT machinery_id FROM machinery_details WHERE location = 'Factory A');
DELETE FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE machine_id = 2001 AND maintenance_type = 'Regular Maintenance' AND scheduled_date < '2022-01-01';
